title: Docs: add project README
description: Create a README that explains what the site is, how to run it, and the key directories.
acceptance_criteria: README.md exists with stack, scripts, and project structure; reveal-on-scroll behavior documented.
close_reason: Added README with scripts, structure, and reveal behavior.

title: Repo: create GitHub public repository and push
description: Create a public GitHub repository for this project and push the current contents.
acceptance_criteria: Repository exists on GitHub under the authenticated account and all project files are pushed to the default branch.
close_reason: Created public GitHub repo and pushed main branch.
